step_feedback.feedback: Your first repetition's shoulder and wrist movements were quite accurate. For the second repetition, try to keep your elbows closer to your body and reduce the overall movement in your wrists.

In the first repetition, your shoulder movements were good, but your elbows and wrists moved a bit too much. For the second repetition, focus on minimizing elbow and wrist motion while keeping your shoulders engaged.

For the first repetition, your shoulders were well-aligned, but your elbows and wrists showed some extra movement. In the second repetition, aim to reduce the motion in your elbows and wrists while maintaining shoulder engagement.
Your first repetition's shoulder and elbow movements were good. For the second repetition, try to minimize the movement in your wrists and keep your elbows more stable.
Your first repetition's shoulder and wrist movements were quite accurate. For the second repetition, focus on keeping your elbows steady and reducing any extra wrist motion.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms straight overhead and focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together. Try to minimize extra movement in your elbows and wrists.
